name: Autoridad Portuaria de la Bahía de Algeciras
goal: Port Infrastructure management, monitoring commercial activities and developing the logistics area necesaries for the activity. Concessions management
interests: Borders and Security, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Customs, Energy, Environment, European Neighbourhood Policy, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives:
REGULATION (EU) No 13152013 guidelines for the development of the trans-European transport network

Regulation (EU) 913/2010 concerning a European rail network for competitive freight ('‘the Regulation')
aims to boost the competitiveness of rail freight in the EU, via the creation of Rail Freight Corridors (RFCs)
with a view to developing a European rail network for competitive freight.
